titles.title: PREP Act
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to establish an Office of Federal Correctional Education, and for other purposes.
PREP Act
Promoting Reentry Through Education in Prisons Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Promoting Reentry Through Education in Prisons Act of 2018 or the PREP Act
This bill amends the federal criminal code to establish, within the Bureau of Prisons, an Office of Federal Correctional Education to promote educational services for federal criminal offenders.
